image.caption: Cloud Forest
image.alt: Mist and Rain drifts through the cloud forest in the hills of Santa Marta.
image.altDe: Nebel und Regen ziehen durch den Wald in den Hügeln von Santa Marta.

image.caption: Desert Nights
image.alt: The Milky Way over the Erg Chigaga in Morocco on a beautiful night.
image.altDe: Die Milchstraße über der Erg Chigaga in Marokko an einer wunderschönen Nacht.

image.caption: Essaouira Surf
image.alt: Waves crashing at the short in front of the Essaouira ramparts
image.altDe: Wellen schlagen an die Küste vor der Stadtmauer von Essaouira.

image.caption: Stubai Magic
image.alt: The Mountains of the Stubai Valley and the Rinnensee on a stormy evening.
image.altDe: Die Berge des Stubaitals und der Rinnensee an einem stürmischen Abend.

image.caption: Fantasia
image.alt: The hills and forests of Saxony Switzerland at Sunrise.
image.altDe: Die Hügel und Wälder der Sächsischen Schweiz zu Sonnenaufgang.

image.caption: Secret Beach
image.alt: A secluded beach in the South of Mahe Island, the main island of the Seychelles.
image.altDe: Ein versteckter Strand im Süden von Mahe, der Hauptinsel der Seychellen.

image.caption: Inferno - Australia
image.alt: A spectacular sunset at Whisky Bay in Wilsons Promontory National Park in Australia.
image.altDe: Ein spektakulärer Sonnenuntergang an der Whisky Bay im Wilsons Promontory Nationalpark in Australien.

image.caption: Adraga Sunset - Portugal
image.alt: Sunset at Praia da Adraga in Portugal.
image.altDe: Sonnenuntergang am Praia da Adraga in Portugal.

image.caption: Oasis - Peru
image.alt: The desert Oasis of Huacachina in Peru during Sunrise.
image.altDe: Die Wüstenoase Huacachina in Peru zu Sonnenaufgang.

image.caption: Gibson Steps - Australia
image.alt: The Gibson Steps at the 12 Apostels coast in Australia with a colorful sunset behind.
image.altDe: Die Gibson Steps bei den 12 Aposteln in Australien mit einem farbenfrohen Sonnenuntergang.

image.caption: Auckland Blues - New Zealand
image.alt: The Auckland Skyline with the motorway as seen during Blue hour in the morning.
image.altDe: Die Skyline Aucklands zur Blauen Stunde am morgen.

image.caption: Revelation - New Zealand
image.alt: Mount Ruapehu and the lower Tama Lake on a windy evening in New Zealand.
image.altDe: Mount Ruapehu und der Lower Tama See an einem windigen Abend in Neuseeland.

image.caption: Dark Side of the Moon - Chile
image.alt: The bizarre rock formations of the Valle de La Luna in the Atacama in Chile.
image.altDe: Die bizarren Felsformationen des Valle de la Luna in der Atacama in Chile.

image.caption: Bandon Sunset - USA
image.alt: Sunset behind the sea stacks of Bandon Beach in Oregon.
image.altDe: Sonnenuntergang hinter den Sea Stacks des Bandon Beach in Oregon.

image.caption: Natural History Museum - London
image.alt: The entrance hall of the Natural History Museum in London.
image.altDe: Die Eingangshalle des Natural History Museums in London.

image.caption: Bracelet Bay - Wales
image.alt: The Mumbles Lighthouse and Bracelet Bay on the Gower Peninsula in Wales.
image.altDe: Die Bracelet Bay und der Mumbles Leuchtturm auf der Gower Peninsula in Wales.

image.caption: German Rainforest - Germany
image.alt: The Grobbach river in the lush, green Black Forest at springtime.
image.altDe: Der Grobbach im saftig grünen Schwarzwald im Frühling.

image.caption: Krimml Magic - Austria
image.alt: The mighty Krimml Waterfall in magical morning light.
image.altDe: Der mächtige Krimmler Wasserfall im magischen Morgenlicht.

image.caption: Marinha Dawn - Portugal
image.alt: Praia da Marinha at the Algarve in Portugal during sunrise.
image.altDe: Praia da Marinha an der Algarve in Portugal zu Sonnenaufgang.

image.caption: Milford Blues - New Zealand
image.alt: The fiord and the mountains of Milford Sound at evening.
image.altDe: Die Berge und der Fjord des Milford Sound am Abend.

image.caption: Rappensee Sunset - Germany
image.alt: Sunset in the Algäu Mountains of Germany.
image.altDe: Sonnenuntergang in den Allgäuer Bergen von Deutschland

image.caption: Salt - Bolivia
image.alt: The salt plains of the Salar de Uyuni in Bolivia.
image.altDe: Die Salzwüste der Salar de Uyuni in Bolivien.

image.caption: Alpine Paradise - Austria
image.alt: The Sonnespitze Mountain in the Austrian Alps with the Zugspitze.
image.altDe: Die Sonnenspitze in den österreichischen Alpen mit der Zugspitze.

image.caption: Trotternish - Isle of Skye
image.alt: The Trotternish ridge as seen from the Quiraing during sunrise.
image.altDe: Das Trotternish zu Sonnenaufgang, gesehen vom Quiraing.

image.caption: Westminster Storm - London
image.alt: Stormy sunset over Westminster Bridge in London.
image.altDe: Ein stürmischer Sonnenuntergang über der Westminster Brücke in London.

image.caption: Yaki Point - Grand Canyon
image.alt: Yaki Point at the South Rim of the Grand Canyon in the US.
image.altDe: Yaki Point am Südrand des Grand Canyon in den USA.
